story.storykicker: On the 87th birth anniversary of Nargis Dutt, keep scrolling to know some facts about her.
story.storybody:
The Padma Shri Nargis Dutt is a well-known name in the film industry. With movies like Awara, Shree 420, Chori Chori and Mother India, she gave us some of the best movies and songs. We still like to hum 'Pyaar Hua Iqraar Hua, Jahan Mai Jaati Hu' or 'Dum Bhar Jo Idhar Muh Phere' and several other songs.

{mosimage}
 

On what would have been her 87th birthday, we have tried to dig out some facts about her life. Keep scrolling to know about the "Mother India":

1.   Nargis Dutt was born with a name -- Fatima Rashid.

2.   Her mother Jaddanbai was a classical singer and a courtesan who played a big part in introducing Nargis to the film industry.

3.   She was introduced to the film industry at an early age. She appeared as a child artist, at the age of six, in Talash-E-Haq in 1935.

4.   She had an affair with Raj Kapoor before she married Sunil Dutt. Raj Kapoor was already married when he started dating Nargis and had refused to divorce his wife. This resulted in their break-up.

{mosimage}
 

5.   Sunil Dutt had reportedly saved her from a fire, that broke out on the sets of Mother India, which made her fall in love with him. She wanted to kill herself before Sunil Dutt came into her life.

6.   She was awarded a Filmfare Award for the Oscar-nominated film Mother India.

7.   She was honoured with the National Film Award for her performance in Raat aur Din. It was her last appearance in the movies. 

{mosimage}
 

8.   She left her film career after she got married to Sunil Dutt.

9.   She was diagnosed with pancreatic cancer. 

10. After her death, a road in Bandra was renamed in her memory. It is now called as 'Nargis Dutt Road'.
